Message:
I had heard that both
my mom and sisters used
to work as handmaidens,

which is why I wanted to
follow in their footsteps.

There are people who would
say that being a handmaiden is
the perfect job for country folk
like us who’ve never had
any form of schooling...

But I’ve always wanted to
become a handmaiden.

It’s been my goal ever
since I was younger,

when I realized just how much
I enjoy taking care of people.

and one day, I’d have
that fateful encounter,
just like my mother did.

I’d meet the master
I’m destined to serve,
and work to make him happy...

To achieve that dream,
I believed I could overcome
any hardship...

It never even crossed my mind
that a witch couldn’t become
a handmaiden...
